javapns.communication
Class SSLConnectionHelper

java.lang.Object
  javapns.communication.SSLConnectionHelper

public class SSLConnectionHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class help create a connection to the Apple Server with a SLL Socket

Author:
Maxime Peron, idbill (feedback code), Nathan Hadfield (new InputStream code)

keystoreType - the keystore type (JKS or PKCS12)
